name: Stickman Legends－Shadow Of War
description:
Ready to join the battles? Download NOW the best addicting action RPG game ever for FREE.
Choose your heroes, crush the enemies and become the legend.
Stickman Legends is an offline and online stickman fighting game, a great combination of Role-playing game (RPG) and Player vs Player (PvP).

Game Features:
- Various stick fight heroes are waiting for you: Shido the Warrior, Bernald the Guardian, Ignite the Gunner, Mistral the Archer, Raven the Mage, Hason the Warmaniac.
- Enjoy utilizing the multiple upgrades and ultimate items.
- Challenge yourself to survive in survival game with endless waves of undead enemies.
- Enter the arena of shadow fight, wipe out the opponent at a glance in each epic battle.
- There are rankings to make the game more interesting and entertaining. Make friends all over the world and compete your warriors with your friends.

‘Stickman Legends’ is an unforgettable experience, the best choice in series of stickman games and ninja games.
Download Stickman Legends and share your moment with friends now!
